short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically earn points when you shop online. Redeem your points for flights, products or gift cards.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Truffle, the ultimate online shopping companion that turns your everyday purchases into extraordinary rewards. Imagine a world where your regular shopping sprees at your favorite online stores reward you with more than just the products you love. Truffle makes this dream a reality by seamlessly integrating into your online shopping experience, offering a smart, effortless way to earn rewards that go beyond the ordinary.

How It Works: Truffle is elegantly simple. Start by adding our user-friendly Chrome extension to your browser. Shop as you normally would across a network of over a thousand partner stores - from the giants of retail to niche boutiques, ensuring that every purchase counts. There's no need for coupons or to remember to visit special links; Truffle works quietly in the background, accruing points with each purchase made through participating retailers.

The Rewards: What sets Truffle apart is the sheer versatility of its rewards program. Whether you're dreaming of your next vacation, eyeing the latest gadgets, or simply want to indulge in a shopping spree, Truffle's points can be redeemed for flights, products, and gift cards. This flexibility ensures that there's something for everyone, making your online shopping not just satisfying but truly rewarding.

Boost Your Earnings: Truffle understands the thrill of getting more. That's why we offer boosts â€“ special opportunities to accelerate your points accumulation, making it faster and easier to reach your rewards. 

A Community of Shoppers: Joining Truffle means becoming part of a community that knows the value of shopping smarter. Share tips, celebrate earnings, and explore new ways to make the most out of your online purchases. With Truffle, every click brings you closer to your next reward.

Security and Privacy: At Truffle, we take your privacy and security seriously. Our extension is designed to work without intruding on your browsing experience or compromising your personal information. Shop with peace of mind, knowing that your data is protected.
